item.title: By: Kevin Pettitt
item.dc:creator: Kevin Pettitt
item.description: <p>Makes you wonder if some sort of fun-to-read book that tells the behind-the-scenes story of a Notes development project might be a way to attract more people to the platform. Something that will create wider buzz and cut down the "out of fashion" image Notes has in some development circles.<br /><br />Duff would have fun reviewing it, that's for sure <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> />.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Makes you wonder if some sort of fun-to-read book that tells the behind-the-scenes story of a Notes development project might be a way to attract more people to the platform. Something that will create wider buzz and cut down the “out of fashion” image Notes has in some development circles.

Duff would have fun reviewing it, that’s for sure http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />.
